titleStmt.title: The copy of a most pithy and pious letter, vvritten by a faithfull subject of this kingdom, to James Usher Archbishop of Armagh, to perswade our king to return with speed in peace to his Parliament. Published by authority.
titleStmt.author: Faithfull subject of this kingdom.
Ussher, James, 1581-1656.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
